pkgmetadata.longdescription: pysparkline====Python 3 clone of [Zach Holman's BASH sparkline project](https://github.com/holman/spark)Takes series data via stdin, command line, or API and prints a sparkline representation.Usage:- $ `sparkline 4 3 2 1````█▆▃▁```- $ `echo "1.0 1.0 2.0 3.0 5.0 8.0 13.0" | sparkline````▁▁▂▂▃▅█```- $ `seq 20 | sort -R | sparkline -r2````▃▁ █▂ ▂▆▅ ▄▇▆ ██▃██▅▇▄▁███▃▇███▂█▆```- $ `python3 -c "import sparkline; print(sparkline.sparkify([1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0]))"````▁▃▆█```- $ `python3 -c "import math, sparkline; print(sparkline.sparkify([math.cos(n/10.0) for n in range(-50, 50, 2)], rows=4))"```` ▁▃▅▇███▇▅▃▁ ▅▂ ▃▆███████████▆▃ ▂██▇▄▁ ▂▅█████████████████▅▂ ▁▄▇██████▆▄▃▁▁▁▂▃▅▇█████████████████████▇▅▃▂▁▁▁▃▄▆████```
